WorkItem.ClosedComment: Since WPP display "Package Level" rules, it wrongly cleared 'Is Installed' and 'Is Installable' rules when the user doesn't provide those rules.
WorkItem.Description: When publishing an update from a MSP file, if "Is Installable" rules is left blank, the update appears as 'Not Applicable' instead of 'Not Installed'. Therefore, clients computers doesn't install it.
WorkItem.Summary: MSP updates appears as 'Not Applicable' instead of 'Not Installed'

Comments.Message: Now WPP doesn't clear anymore 'Is Installed' and 'Is Installable' rules, if user have not been provide those rules.
Peoples that have publish MSI or MSP updates using default rules, needs to delete these updates and publish again the update with this fixed release.
